mapper.select: SELECT a.id, username, a.type, a.users, b.send_date as createdTime FROM sys_user a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT id, send_date FROM ( SELECT *, row_number() over ( PARTITION BY id ORDER BY send_date DESC ) AS lastIndexCreated FROM (SELECT receive_id AS id, send_date FROM n_messages WHERE send_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT send_id AS id, send_date FROM n_messages WHERE receive_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT send_id AS id, send_date FROM n_messages WHERE send_id IN (SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE users LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')) UNION ALL SELECT receive_id AS id, send_date FROM n_messages WHERE receive_id IN (SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE users LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')) ) T ORDER BY send_date DESC ) T WHERE lastIndexCreated = 1 ) b ON a.id = b.id
